conservative.name: Conservative
conservative.description: Highest confidence, strictest filters - for risk-averse bettors

balanced.name: Balanced
balanced.description: Moderate risk with good edge requirements - recommended default

aggressive.name: Aggressive
aggressive.description: Maximum opportunities - shows all valid picks ranked by EV

description: Risk mode configurations for NFL Quant betting recommendations. Conservative mode shows only the highest confidence picks with strict edge requirements. Balanced mode provides moderate risk with good edge opportunities. Aggressive mode shows all statistically valid picks ranked by expected value, allowing users to choose their own risk tolerance.
